content.value_statement: Create 50+ SEO-optimized pages quickly for local businesses, medical practices, and service providers. This agent follows proven SEO methodologies to help rank in Google within 30 days.
actual_capabilities: Generate 50+ SEO-optimized pages using proven methodology
Create keyword research tables by intent category (emergency, service, problem, location, authority)
Build complete page templates with meta tags, H1 structure, and internal linking
Validate pages against SEO checklist (title length, description, content length, FAQ, schema)
limitations: Requires user input for business-specific content and copy
Does not perform live keyword volume analysis
Does not automatically submit pages to search engines
Does not generate images or visual content

use_cases.title: Local service pages
use_cases.description: Generate location-specific service pages for multi-location businesses

use_cases.title: Procedure content
use_cases.description: Create detailed procedure pages for medical and cosmetic services

use_cases.title: Bulk article generation
use_cases.description: Produce large volumes of SEO blog content efficiently

prompt_templates.title: Basic service page
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an SEO page for /servicos/[service-name]/ with keyword [main keyword], targeting [audience]. Include H1, meta description under 160 chars, FAQ section with 5 questions, and MedicalProcedure schema.

prompt_templates.title: Location pages
prompt_templates.prompt: Generate location pages for [city-1], [city-2], [city-3] for [service name]. Use the batch generator template with brand [brand name], service [service], and CTAs for /contato/

prompt_templates.title: Blog articles
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a 2000+ word blog article about [topic] with keyword [primary keyword]. Include H2s for [secondary keywords], internal links to /servicos/, and FAQ schema.

prompt_templates.title: Full site audit
prompt_templates.prompt: Run the Pele SEO auditor on ./src/app directory. Generate an HTML report with all issues, duplicate content detection, and orphan page analysis.

best_practices: Use high-intent keywords where users are ready to take action
Create unique content per location instead of copying templates
Include 5-7 FAQ questions per page with schema markup
Maintain consistent internal linking across all pages
anti_patterns: Do not duplicate content across multiple pages without canonical tags
Do not use thin content under 1500 words for service pages
Do not forget alt text on images or canonical URLs
Do not skip hreflang tags for multilingual content

faq.question: How many pages can this skill generate?
faq.answer: The batch generator can create unlimited pages from a JSON configuration file.

faq.question: Does it create content automatically?
faq.answer: It generates page structure and templates. You provide the specific copy and business details.

faq.question: What SEO elements are included?
faq.answer: Title, meta description, H1-H2 structure, internal links, FAQ schema, and canonical URLs.

faq.question: Can I validate existing pages?
faq.answer: Yes, use pele-seo-auditor.py to validate pages against SEO checklist and generate reports.

faq.question: Does it support multiple languages?
faq.answer: Yes, templates support PT-BR, EN, and ES with hreflang configuration.

faq.question: What frameworks does it support?
faq.answer: Primary support for Astro 5.x with React, also works with generic HTML/JSX projects.
